creator: jstauffe@spscommerce.com
text:
It would be nice to have an appender that allows more configuration about how
files are named based on the date.  i.e. Use a file pattern like
'logs/'yyyy/MM-MMM/dd-EEE/HH-mm-ss-S'.log' to create a file like
'logs/2004/04-Apr/13-Tue/09-45-15-937.log'
Hopefully this doesn't already exist in 1.3 so that I am not just adding noise.

See the org.apache.log4j.rolling package in log4j 1.3 which has a facility offering 
the same feature.
creator: ceki@apache.org
